metadata.title: CVE-2023-27785 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: An issue found in TCPreplay TCPprep v.4.4.3 allows a remote attacker tocause a denial of service via the parse endpoints function.

criterions.comment: tcpreplay: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
